author: Mark Emem
title: This 10-Minute Coronavirus Test is What the World Needs – And it Costs $1
description: As the number of the world's COVID-19 cases approach half a million, a British firm has developed a testing kit for the coronavirus that is cheaper and quicker in its diagnosis. The post This 10-Minute Coronavirus Test is What the World Needs – And it Costs $…
content:
• A coronavirus diagnostic kit developed by a British firm is not only cheaper but is also faster.
  • The testing kit aimed at the developing world could assist even the advanced economies such as the U.S. Less than 0.2% of the U.S. population had … [+2802 chars]
